divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were driving from so cal to phoenix.it was early night and we saw what appeared to be a mother ship and 3 baby ships in the sky.it would have been impossible not to see them.the mother ship was just drifting in the sky but the 3 baby ships were floating down with decreasing speed as they moved away from mama ship.them they would drift back to mother ship and increasing speed shoot around larger ship and shoot off into the horizon and then drift back.this went on for an hour or more and was observed by me and my driver.the funny thing is they resembled biological beings and reminded us of looking at an aquarium with some very srange fish indeed.
Summary: the night sky became an aquarium
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around December 21st 1988
